column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kim - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry you had to wait an unacceptable amount of time for your ramen to reach your table. When we're serving parties of 6 or more
column3: order modifications and other large parties can cause slight delays. We do our best to accommodate everyone in the order in which the tickets are received
column5: as much as we try to be. If you feel there was an egregious amount of time due to a discernible error on our part
column6: please let me know and I would be happy to review our security-camera footage to determine the possible breakdown.
